table.name: vtiger_sitevisit
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sitevisit` (`sitevisitid` int(11) NOT NULL, `sitevisitno` varchar(100) default NULL, `sitevisit_tks_visitdate` date default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`sitevisitid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sitevisitcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sitevisitcf` (`sitevisitid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sitevisitid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sitevisit_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sitevisit_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_sitevisit_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
